dataset_id: BOREAS RSS-08 BIOME-BGC Model Simulations at Tower Flux Sites in 1994
title: BOREAS RSS-08 BIOME-BGC Model Simulations at Tower Flux Sites in 1994
summary: BIOME-BGC is a general ecosystem process model designed to simulate biogeochemical and hydrologic processes across multiple scales.  BIOME-BGC is used to estimate daily water and carbon budgets for the BOREAS tower flux sites for 1994.
